synopsis.text: Pac-Worlder by day and legendary ghost-eater by necessity, Pac, an unassuming teen, finds himself thrust into an extraordinary role when the once sealed gateway to the Netherworld shatters. Alongside his trusted friends Spiral, Shirindoria, and Cyli, Pac must juggle the everyday challenges of adolescence while defending their world from the looming threat of Betrayus and his spectral minions. As the only round, yellow citizen in a prophecy foretelling the salvation of Pac-World, Pac embraces his destiny, leading his friends on daring adventures to vanquish the ghosts back to the Netherworld and safeguard their home. With President Spheros guiding them, this brave group stands as the last line of defense against the impending chaos, blending the trials of teenage life with their heroic duties in this thrilling anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
